entry.title: Indra-photon/Markdown-Previewer: A lightweight, responsive Markdown previewer that renders formatting in real-time as you type. Built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript using the Marked.js library. Features a clean split-pane interface with live preview and support for standard Markdown elements including headings, lists, code blocks, and more.
entry.content: A lightweight, responsive Markdown previewer that renders formatting in real-time as you type. Built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript using the Marked.js library. Features a clean split-pane interface with live preview and support for standard Markdown elements including headings, lists, code blocks, and more.

entry.title: thegreedymaster1234/JavaScript-Email-Protection-JEP: JavaScript Email Protection (JEP) is a simple and lightweight way to keep your email safe from spam bots. Instead of leaving your email exposed in plain HTML (where bots can easily grab it), this script dynamically inserts it using JavaScript‚Äîmaking it way harder for scrapers to detect.
entry.content: JavaScript Email Protection (JEP) is a simple and lightweight way to keep your email safe from spam bots. Instead of leaving your email exposed in plain HTML (where bots can easily grab it), this script dynamically inserts it using JavaScript‚Äîmaking it way harder for scrapers to detect.

entry.title: ashish707917/Weather1: This project was created to provide an easy and intuitive way to check the weather of any city. The app is lightweight, responsive, and built with modern web technologies.
